document_data.image: Adventures in Wildspace key art logo.webp
document_data.name: Adventures in Wildspace
document_data.mainbody: '''''Neverwinter: Adventures in Wildspace''''' is an expansion module for the massively-multiplayer role-playing game ''[[Neverwinter (game)|Neverwinter]]''. Released in April 2024, the expansion ties continues the story and setting from the preceding module, ''[[Neverwinter: Spelljammer]]''.
document_data.Features:
* Adventure Zone Expansion: the systems of [[Doomspace]] and [[Xaryxispace]] have been added to the Wildspace Adventure Zone
* New Dungeon: The [[Imperial Citadel]]
